name: Smash the trash!
description:
developed by Daniel González Carricoba. 

SMASH THE TRASH! is a top-down shooter designed to be played in those brief moments when you don’t know what to do because… Is there anything more stress-relieving than blowing up Nazi heads?

On SMASH THE TRASH! you will have to shoot and dodge bullets in Normandy. It’s easy, keep alive and kill the most of that scum until you make a new record. Then, run to the bunker for save your score or... it will be lost and you will have to reach it again!

Fun is the point, challenge your friends to see who lasts the longest in the most famous battle in history.

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump
  • RIGHT CLICK - Aim
  • LEFT CLICK - Shoot
  • Q - Salute
  • ESC - Pause menu
